Text: Guess this is the best rip of Nostalghia available...I have a 700-MB version... but unfortunately, we'll have to take a chance trying to make the subs from other sources work here...but I'd rather take that chance, this is a grossly underrated movie from Tarkovsky's oeuvre.

Not satisfied with the download, I bought the DVD. But no, it's nothign wrong with the rip, the original film seems to be blurry...though some of the shots are breathtaking and not found in any other movie, the movie is bleak all through, in keeping with its character. 
On the whole, a nice rip, though I had to resync another set of English subtitles to use it.
